sourcesContent: import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import Backdrop from "./backdrop"; import useForm from "./hooks/useForm"; const dropIn = { hidden: { y: "-100vh", opacity: 0, }, visible: { y: "0", opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.1, type: "spring", damping: 25, stiffness: 500, }, }, exit: { y: "100vh", opacity: 0, }, }; const dropOut = { visible: { y: "0", opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.1, type: "spring", damping: 25, stiffness: 500, }, }, }; const dropOut2 = { hidden: { y: "-100vh", opacity: 0, }, }; const doped = { visible: { y: "0", opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.1, type: "spring", damping: 25, stiffness: 500, }, }, }; const doped2 = { hidden: { y: "-100vh", opacity: 0, }, }; const Modal = ({ handleClose }) => { const { formOpen, close, open } = useForm(); return ( e.stopPropagation()} className="modal orange-gradient" variants={dropIn} initial="hidden" animate="visible" exit="exit" > {formOpen ? ( e.stopPropagation()} className="modalform orange-gradient" variants={dropOut2} initial="visible" animate="hidden" exit="exit" > Username Password ) : ( e.stopPropagation()} className="modalform orange-gradient" variants={dropOut} initial="visible" animate="hidden" exit="exit" > Username Password ) && formOpen ? ( e.stopPropagation()} className="modalform orange-gradient" variants={dropOut} initial="visible" animate="hidden" exit="exit" > Username Password Email First Name Last Name Phone Gender Male Female Address ) : ( e.stopPropagation()} className="modalform orange-gradient" variants={dropOut} initial="visible" animate="hidden" exit="exit" > Username Password Email First Name Last Name Phone Gender Male Female Address )} (formOpen ? close() : open())} > Test ); }; export default Modal;
